title: London/Hammersmith and Fulham
name: Fulham FC
directions: about 10 min walk from both Putney Bridge and Parsons Green tube stations
content: The home of Premier League football team Fulham. The oldest team in London. Tours of their quirky old stadium on non-matchdays are fun. | image=Craven Cottage Football Ground - geograph.org.uk - 778731.jpg
